text: Madaklashti (مدگلاشتی) is a variety of Persian spoken in the Madaklasht valley of Chitral, Pakistan. It is spoken by the Tajik people and is almost identical to Tajik and Dari varities spoken in neighboring Badakhshan.https://www.researchgate.net/project/Madaklashti-Language ==References== Category:Languages of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Category:Persian language Category:Languages of Pakistan
title: Madaklashti
